channel.title: 317 client randomly closes[FIXED]
channel.description:
I've been having some problems where my 317 clients will randomly cose, and i will get an error form java. I was able to fix my own client by using this code: @echo off cd Client Files echo Cyclone-Scape.no-ip.biz "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
But I can't get it to run when i use other people's client. Here's an example of someone elses client. @ECHO OFF title Official ~UniversalScape~ Client By Bill java -jar -Xmx500m Official_UniversalScape_Client.jar pause
I try to find ways to fix it by editing the client, but nothing works does anybody know how to fix this?

item.title: 317 client randomly closes[FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @kij_jenson kij jenson
item.description:
@kij_jenson wrote:

try this:
@ECHO OFF
title Official ~UniversalScape~ Client By Bill
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw” -jar -Xmx500m Official_UniversalScape_Client.jar
pause

Read full topic

item.title: 317 client randomly closes[FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I’ve been having some problems where my 317 clients will randomly cose, and i will get an error form java.
I was able to fix my own client by using this code:
@echo off
cd Client Files
echo Cyclone-Scape.no-ip.biz
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

But I can’t get it to run when i use other people’s client. Here’s an example of someone elses client.
@ECHO OFF
title Official ~UniversalScape~ Client By Bill
java -jar -Xmx500m Official_UniversalScape_Client.jar
pause

I try to find ways to fix it by editing the client, but nothing works
does anybody know how to fix this?

Read full topic
